title.rendered: Elonys Lopez | Senior Marine Surveyor | Marine Engineer

content.rendered:
Elonys is based in our Korea office, has a Chief Engineer’s certificate and spent 14 years at sea on a variety of vessels. He has experience in Hull & Machinery and P & I Pre-Entry Condition surveys and has attended to various H&M casualty surveys on behalf of Leading Underwriters.

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Accident investigation, hatch cover testing and tanker ops

Contact

Singapore | +65 9729 2964

excerpt.rendered:

Specialism: Accident investigation, hatch cover testing and tanker ops
